title: ISic001115. I.Sicily inscription 001115
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΔΧ
2ΔΟΜΝΑΕΖΕΣΕΝ[...---]
3Μ.ΝΗ´ΒΟΤΤΟΣ[.....]
4ΛΙΤΙΝ.ΤΕΚΝΩΓΛ[.......]
5ΕΠ[......]

Apparatus criticus

Text of IG with minor correction; Kaibel resolves initial Δ as θ(εοῖς), presumably in error
4: Salvatore Morso, ap. Kaibel: ΤΕΚΝΩΤΝ[- - -]

English translation

To the spirits of the dead. Domna lived ... years and 8 months. Bottos and Melitine erected this for the sweetest child.

commentary

bibliography

  • 14.0294 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001072
